import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import '../Style/Home.scss'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const navRef = useRef(), aboutRef = useRef(), workRef = useRef(), contactRef = useRef(); const [ backgroundColor, setBackgroundColor ] = useState('#f7f3f0'); const [ navPosition, setNavPosition ] = useState(false); const [ navActive, setNavActive ] = useState({ about: '', work: '', contact: '' }) const [ aboutAni, setAboutAni ] = useState(''); // const [ contactAni, setContactAni ] = useState(''); const [ mousePosition, setMousePosition ] = useState({ x: 0, y:0 }) const [ workListImg, setWorkListImg ] = useState({ NetflixClone: '', NokchaStore: '', JavascriptProject: '' }) useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setAboutAni('--active'); }, 310); console.log('useEffect for mount') }, []); useEffect(() => { const handleNavPosition = () => { if(window.pageYOffset > window.innerHeight * 1.5) { setNavPosition(false); }else{ setNavPosition(-window.pageYOffset * 0.5); } } window.addEventListener('scroll', handleNavPosition); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleNavPosition); }, []); useEffect(() => { const handleNavEffect = () => { let offsetTop = { current: window.pageYOffset, nav: navRef.current.offsetTop, about: aboutRef.current.offsetTop, work: workRef.current.offsetTop, contact: contactRef.current.offsetTop } if(offsetTop.current > offsetTop.contact * 0.8){ setNavActive({ about: '', work: '', contact: '--active' }) }else if(offsetTop.current > offsetTop.work * 0.8){ setNavActive({ about: '', work: '--active', contact: '' }) }else if(offsetTop.current > offsetTop.about){ setNavActive({ about: '--active', work: '', contact: '' }) } } window.addEventListener('scroll', handleNavEffect); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleNavEffect); }, []); const handleMouseEnterToNetflixClone = () => { setBackgroundColor('#7395ae'); setWorkListImg({ NetflixClone: '--active' }) } const handleMouseEnterToNokchaStore = () => { setBackgroundColor('#7395ae'); setWorkListImg({ NokchaStore: '--active' }) } const handleMouseEnterToJavascriptProject = () => { setBackgroundColor('#557a95'); setWorkListImg({ JavascriptProject: '--active' }) } const handleMouseLeave = () => { setBackgroundColor('#379683'); setWorkListImg({ NetflixClone: '', NokchaStore: '', JavascriptProject: '' }) } return (
